title: Material Symbols is Googleâ€™s new library of modern icons
content:
There are are many different ways for software developers to add common icons to their apps, websites, and web apps. Google’s Material Icons collection has been a popular option over the years, especially for anything designed to roughly match the look of Material Design, and now Google has published an updated collection. The new Material

The post Material Symbols is Google’s new library of modern icons appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google has a new Material Symbols collection of customizable icons for web and native apps, available to use for free.
